channel.title: Help with small santa quest

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:16, topic:252214”][quote author=I D D S I link=topic=333107.msg2596867#msg2596867 date=1230023891]
can you make also ther comes a screen up
with Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!

If you know how, can you tell me?

Also. Realy thanks `Rich and xx qwertyuiop xx
[/quote]
You can open an interface with the showInterface(int interfaceId) method

showInterface(####); // Replace the #s with the id of the interface you want shown.

and write on it with the sendQuest(String words, int lineId) method.

sendQuest("Ho ho ho, you don't have the correct items yet, noob!", ####); // Replaces the #s with the id of the line you want the text placed on.

Here’s an example:

clearQuestInterface(); // This opens an interface to write on. sendQuest("Ho ho ho, you don't have the correct items yet, noob!", 8145); [/quote]

hhm, it also can be so ther will be a talk box coming up?
if its possible:P

like mabye talk2 if i was good

Read full topic

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:15, topic:252214”]can you make also ther comes a screen up
with Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!

If you know how, can you tell me?

Also. Realy thanks `Rich and xx qwertyuiop xx[/quote]
You can open an interface with the showInterface(int interfaceId) method

showInterface(####); // Replace the #s with the id of the interface you want shown.

and write on it with the sendQuest(String words, int lineId) method.

sendQuest("Ho ho ho, you don't have the correct items yet, noob!", ####); // Replaces the #s with the id of the line you want the text placed on.

Here’s an example:

clearQuestInterface(); // This opens an interface to write on.
sendQuest("Ho ho ho, you don't have the correct items yet, noob!", 8145);

Read full topic

item.title: Help with small santa quest

item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Realy [quote="`Rich, post:14, topic:252214"] case 111: talk("Get the next items. Put them NOTED! you get a reward.", 1552); break; case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bone", 1552); break; case 113: if (playerHasItemAmount(1892, 5) && playerHasItemAmount(454, 5) && playerHasItemAmount(378, 4) && playerHasItemAmount(537, 3)) { talk("Happy New year, And have fun.",1552); deleteItem(1892, 5); deleteItem(454, 5); deleteItem(378, 4); deleteItem(537, 3); addItem(2749, 25); addItem(2750, 25); addItem(2751, 25); addItem(4084, 25); } else { sendMessage("Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!"); } break;[/quote]

Realy realy nice. Helped me very good.
But 1 question, if its possible.

can you make also ther comes a screen up
with Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!

If you know how, can you tell me?

Also. Realy thanks `Rich and xx qwertyuiop xx

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case 111: talk("Get the next items. Put them NOTED! you get a reward.", 1552); break; case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bone", 1552); break; case 113: if (playerHasItemAmount(1892, 5) && playerHasItemAmount(454, 5) && playerHasItemAmount(378, 4) && playerHasItemAmount(537, 3)) { talk("Happy New year, And have fun.",1552); deleteItem(1892, 5); deleteItem(454, 5); deleteItem(378, 4); deleteItem(537, 3); addItem(2749, 25); addItem(2750, 25); addItem(2751, 25); addItem(4084, 25); } else { sendMessage("Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!"); } break;

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:12, topic:252214”]Like the playerHasItem method the playerHasItemAmount method also returns a value of true or false.
So you’d use it in if statement as well.[/quote]

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Like the playerHasItem method the playerHasItemAmount method also returns a value of true or false.
So you’d use it in if statement as well.

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:10, topic:252214”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=333107.msg2596835#msg2596835 date=1230022744]
It would be playerHasItemAmount method.
[/quote]
Oh, that’s correct.[/quote]

wher to do that 1? just add deleteItem(1892, 5); deleteItem(454, 5); deleteItem(378, 4); deleteItem(537, 3);

So change that to playerHasItemAmount(1892, 5); playerHasItemAmount(454, 5); playerHasItemAmount(378, 4); playerHasItemAmount(537, 3);

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

			case 111:
				talk("Get the next items. Put them NOTED! you get a reward.", 1552);
				break;
			case 112:
				talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bone", 1552);
				break;
			case 113:
				if(playerHasItem(1892, 5) && playerHasItem(454, 5) && playerHasItem(378, 4) && playerHasItem(537, 3))
				{
					talk("Happy New year, And have fun.",1552);
					deleteItem(1892, 5);
					deleteItem(454, 5);
					deleteItem(378, 4);
					deleteItem(537, 3);
					addItem(2749, 25);
					addItem(2750, 25);
					addItem(2751, 25);
					addItem(4084, 25);
				}
				else
				{
					sendMessage("Ho ho ho! You don't have the correct items yet, noob!");
				}
			break;

This should work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

hhm.
im not that realy good in quest. but it will look like this? case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bone", 1552); if(playerHasItem(1892, 5) && playerHasItem(454, 5) && playerHasItem(378, 4) && playerHasItem(537, 3)) { // The player has the items necessary to receive a reward. Delete the items and give the player a reward. } else { // Tell the player they don't have the required items. } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, the return type of the playerHasItem method is a boolean, so it should be used in an if statement like so:

if(playerHasItem(1892, 5) && playerHasItem(454, 5) && playerHasItem(378, 4) && playerHasItem(537, 3))
{
    // The player has the items necessary to receive a reward. Delete the items and give the player a reward.
}
else
{
    // Tell the player they don't have the required items.
}

Read full topic

@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:252214”]You need to check if the player actually has the items.
Use the playerHasItem method.[/quote]

so like this: playerHasItem(1892, 5); playerHasItem(454, 5); playerHasItem(378, 4); playerHasItem(537, 3);

item.title: Help with small santa quest
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Hello, i made a small santa quest…

But i want only if you gives this items : [code]

			deleteItem(1892, 5);
			deleteItem(454, 5);
			deleteItem(378, 4);
			deleteItem(537, 3);[/code]

If you did give that.
That it will give you this items: addItem(2749, 25); addItem(2750, 25); addItem(2751, 25); addItem(4084, 25);

This i have with the talking. case 111: talk("Get the next items. Put them NOTED! you get a reward.", 1552); break; case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bone", 1552); deleteItem(1892, 5); deleteItem(454, 5); deleteItem(378, 4); deleteItem(537, 3); break; case 113: talk("Happy New year, And have fun.",1552); addItem(2749, 25); addItem(2750, 25); addItem(2751, 25); addItem(4084, 25); break;

But if i talk him. i just click contineu, and then im at case 113. and he still will gives you the items.
Any1 help to fix please.

Thanks. I D D S I

Read full topic
